title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description:
Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.

Description: When the key is left blank in the properties file, externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart's title.
OB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart's title.
EB: The expected behavior is that externalized text can be displayed in the chart title even when the key is blank.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Attempt to add a new localization key.
2. Leave the key blank in the properties file with a valid value.
3. Check that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
